feed.title: Leantime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Info: The updater CLI command was fixed in this release. When updating a regular install please follow the instructions for a manual update (just replace the files with the ones in the release package)

  • Laravel auth service by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2823
  • Improved Avatar Handling by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2826
  • Fixing user role issue for manager by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2828
  • Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818 by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2827
  • Performance improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2829
  • Updated language file manager for plugins by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2832
  • CLI updates fixing updater and backupDb command by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2833
  • CSV validation improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2834

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.2...v3.3.3

Commits

  • b811bfa36 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3
  • 752bfec26 Version Bump
  • f44dbb8fc style fixes
  • 6828e9c04 Check for datetime parsing and sprint verification
  • 22d28a514 Fixes updater and backup creator
  • 87e377482 Updating how we load language files from plugins and caching them
  • 838c83679 Update bug_report.yml
  • 8b804d4ab Update UpdateLeantime.php
  • fd340969d Update Registration.php
  • 706991635 LanguageFile Registration improvements
  • 3a0aa4a4a fix code styles
  • ee7991394 Improving eventDispatcher findListener call and settings repo
  • 177d5143f Fix styles and ignore generated files in pint
  • 743beee87 Code style fixes
  • ad64371e7 Fix access issues regarding manager role #2820
  • 3619037a7 code style fix
  • 28343d36d Fix issue with api guard not having access to apikey
  • 120f57869 Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818
  • 29ad2e6bf Fixing code style
  • ee6285bd7 Add unit tests
  • 73af0b656 Create new avatar creator support class and ensure avatars can be generated in various languages and encodings
  • 936dcbf68 fix code styles
  • 4e2c859a8 Fix authcheck missing parameter
  • 5d18d8cc1 Using laravel auth and adding leantime as auth provider.
  • fabd4091d Check translations strings
  • d18f0c834 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.2

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (24 commits)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Highlights

Infra (Stability, Performance)

  • Authentication system has been updated and aligned to Laravel authentication handler enhancing security resilience and more integrations
  • Marketplace integration and plugin installation improved
  • Improvements to cache handling
  • Improved handling of proxy server set ups
  • Improved configuration management
  • Refactor db service to use Laravel db manager (for future replacement and support of Postgres, SQLite etc)
  • Refactored Event Manager to be compatible with Laravel event manager
  • More unit tests

UI

  • New ticket design to improve cognitive load
  • UI cleanup
  • Many, many bug fixes 3.4.0 Bugs

ðŸš¨ Breaking Changes

  • YAML configuration files are not supported anymore. Please move to .env files

ðŸš¨ Docker configuration updates

Due to the user/group updates on the docker image there is a small chance you run into file permission issues on existing volumes check https://github.com/Leantime/docker-leantime?tab=readme-ov-file#common-issues--solutions for setting the permissions correctly.

Additionally we updated the internal port to be 8080. Please make sure your docker compose files reflect the recent changes

Details

  • [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2835
  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.5.3 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2853
  • ITKDev: Added session to API users by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2903
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2918
  • feat: improve roadmap date handling and milestone retrieval by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2926
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2924
  • Update UpdateLeantime.php by @Er1c85 in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2844
  • Bump guzzlehttp/oauth-subscriber from 0.6.0 to 0.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2883
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2935
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2937
  • fixes unescaped string by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2941

New Contributors

  • @Er1c85 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2844

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.3...v3.4.0

Changes in this Release

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.1
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Dark Theme Updates (and 2 gray scale color scheme options)
  • Docker Image now supports PUID=1000 and PGID=1000 arguments as well as a a user var to run leantime as non-root
  • Clean up plugin marketplace page

ðŸš¨ Permission issues with the new docker image

Due to the user/group updates on the docker image there is a small chance you run into file permission issues on existing volumes check https://github.com/Leantime/docker-leantime?tab=readme-ov-file#common-issues--solutions for setting the permissions correctly.

Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.0 to @

Commits

  • af0eba406 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.1
  • 66271faa0 task: add manifest and package-lock
  • 943418870 feat: Update Release Version to 3.4.1
  • db913f8f8 Update release.yml
  • 606be4d25 fix: various dark theme bugs and saving theme settings issues
  • 43635f913 fix: Show tasks on milestone page without task parents shows 500
  • 3f3a38997 Update SECURITY.md
  • 435e3f744 Update SECURITY.md
  • f5664556a Update SECURITY.md
  • e9924fbe0 Readme updates
  • 0f9a8310e Additional Readme Updates
  • 85cc204e6 Readme updates and new screenshots
  • a7ca7ebaf Update bug_report.yml
  • bc28a1bea Update feature_request.yml
  • bf1b1f071 Update feature_request.yml
  • 76c3df146 Update feature_request.yml
  • a3261e9fa Update bug_report.yml
  • 02d0ac72b Update bug_report.yml
  • eeb676f68 Update plugin.blade.php
  • 3006fe6bf [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.0

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (18 commits)

Files

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.2
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Various bug fixes
  • Improved caching of images
  • Preloading important urls on mouseover to improve page latency

Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.1 to @

Updates

  • b64038103 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.2
  • 14e71adad fix: typo in provider name
  • e9d59a05d fix: update and expand standard iso8601 dateformat management
  • c7964a17f fix: datetime issues in calendar and sprints
  • a9ec03242 fix: dashboard delete status and allow replies
  • be8ee466b task: fix code style and update version number
  • ca1a2f6a3 fix: Ensure milestone hierarchy is loaded and displayed correctly
  • abd734333 feat: various small design improvements
  • fd4a040b1 fix: theme image could not be loaded due to test chars in header
  • 241303b31 feat: add new template event for ticket due date
  • 8451caf3d fix: formatting for status field in subtasks
  • 04169c50c fix: import project via csv import failed due to missing state
  • 3e35f5689 feat: preload important urls on mouseover
  • af056a959 fix: name in testemail command
  • c1bd5c467 feat: Ensure images and other static files are cached by browsers
  • 65fe92e63 feat: Improved error reporting for json parse errors on api requests
  • 8d332775e fix: Allow usernames with spaces (ldap issue)
  • 9ebf1ea68 fix: i18n file for js was not loaded correctly with plugin language files
  • 15de91e47 feat: new command to clear language cache files
  • af0eba406 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.1

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (20 commits)

Files

CHANGELOG.md | 47 +++++++++++++ app/Command/ClearLanguage.php | 71 +++++++++++++++++++ app/Command/TestEmailCommand.php | 3 +- app/Core/Configuration/AppSettings.php | 2 +- app/Core/Middleware/AuthCheck.php | 1 - app/Core/Support/DateTimeHelper.php | 18 +++++ app/Domain/Api/Controllers/I18n.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Api/Controllers/Jsonrpc.php | 45 +++++++++--- app/Domain/Auth/Controllers/Login.php | 2 +- .../Auth/Templates/partials/loginInfo.blade.php | 10 +-- app/Domain/Calendar/Services/Calendar.php | 32 +++++++-- .../Comments/Templates/components/reply.blade.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Connector/Services/Connector.php | 22 +++--- app/Domain/CsvImport/Services/CsvImport.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Dashboard/Templates/show.blade.php | 5 +- app/Domain/Files/Controllers/Get.php | 3 + app/Domain/Menu/Repositories/Menu.php | 1 + app/Domain/Menu/Templates/headMenu.blade.php | 3 +- app/Domain/Menu/Templates/menu.blade.php | 2 +- .../Menu/Templates/partials/leftnav/item.blade.php | 1 + app/Domain/Projects/Repositories/Projects.php | 14 ++-- app/Domain/Sprints/Controllers/EditSprint.php | 9 ++- app/Domain/Sprints/Services/Sprints.php | 15 +++- app/Domain/Tickets/Services/Tickets.php | 40 +++++++---- .../Tickets/Templates/partials/subtasks.blade.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Tickets/Templates/showKanban.tpl.php | 17 +++-- .../Templates/submodules/ticketBoardTabs.sub.php | 6 +- .../Templates/submodules/timelineTabs.sub.php | 6 +- app/Plugins | 2 +- app/Views/Templates/sections/header.blade.php | 1 - package-lock.json | 4 +- package.json | 2 +- public/assets/css/components/dropdowns.css | 9 ++- public/assets/css/components/forms.css | 82 ++++++++++++++++++++++ public/assets/css/components/structure.css | 4 +- .../jquery.nyroModal/js/jquery.nyroModal.custom.js | 47 +++++++++++-- public/assets/js/libs/simpleGantt/frappe-gantt.js | 5 +- public/dist/mix-manifest.json | 30 ++++---- 38 files changed, 462 insertions(+), 107 deletions(-)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.3
entry.content:
ðŸš¨ Docker configuration updates

Due to the user/group updates on the docker image there is a small chance you run into file permission issues on existing volumes check https://github.com/Leantime/docker-leantime?tab=readme-ov-file#common-issues--solutions for setting the permissions correctly.

Additionally we updated the internal port to be 8080. Please make sure your docker compose files reflect the recent changes

Highlights

For a full list of 3.4 updates see: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/releases/tag/v3.4.0

  • Fixed date issue in milestone, timesheet, sprint generation
  • Fixed cron handler for long running schedule:work job to be able to run cron jobs in docker
  • Misc other fixes

Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.2 to @

Commits

  • c26c74022 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.3
  • af62ea4e6 task: clean up ticket service
  • deffc4e85 fix: not sending notifications when project id is not set correctly
  • e5384f22a fix: console kernel to point to the correct binary
  • 12ad2e501 fix api endpoint to get open user tickets
  • 7b3539d94 task: update version
  • 2759494d2 task: Improve dailyIngestion report management
  • 8a3ee6a1c fix: add missing field
  • 1d0b24291 fix: broken datetime management on sprints creating various bugs throughout the system
  • 86b40bdbb task: Cleanup and improve datetime helper class
  • 3dd728b57 Fix link
  • b64038103 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.2

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (9 commits)
  • Torsten StÃ¶ter (1 commits)

Files
